snippet: Evan R. Chesler, the chairman of the law firm Cravath, Swaine & Moore, will take over as the library chairman from Neil L. Rudenstine.
abstract: Evan R. Chesler, the chairman of the law firm Cravath, Swaine & Moore, will take over as the library chairman from Neil L. Rudenstine.

headline.main: New York Public Library Names New Chairman
headline.print_headline: New York Public Library To Name New Chairman
